synopsis.text: Vogel's subversive short animation, directed by the renowned Kuri Youji, presents an unconventional perspective on romantic love. The story revolves around a relentless woman who is utterly infatuated with a man. She pursues him persistently through various settings, from dense forests to bustling caf√©s, with a single goal in mind: to bind him to her forever. Her relentless chase is accompanied by her constant cries of "Ai," the Japanese word for love. Despite her attempts to tame him with a chain, she fails, yet the pursuit continues indefinitely. Will the man ever succumb to her love, or will this unusual chase persist forever? The answer lies within this thought-provoking and captivating anime.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
